entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -25.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 10:42 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -25.3°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.9°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
